title: Ranked after the season ended
body: So I'm ranked silver after November 7th so i don't get my ranked border or is there still someway i can get my border? or is it just wait until the next season ends?{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}} TY :D

replies.body: Rankings during preseason don't count towards end of season rewards. Once the new season starts you'll have a new set of placement matches to play through, and that will decide your starting rank for the new season.
